page.title: 18THE COBHAM NEWS AND MAIL
page.content:
More news from the week 3rd-10th July.
St. Andrew's Church of England School in Lockhart Road, celebrated its 125th year.An exhibition of past events, a bonfire and fireworks were among the entertainments.
Two Cobham teenagers raised Â£425 for the British Heart Foundation by taking part in a sponsored bike ride from London to Brighton.
Cobham Middle School's Mrs Irene Anstis (teacher) left after 33 years at the school and was presented with an enormous bouquet of flowers and a Dawson Strange photographic portrait.
The council plans to put more sewers in Cobham.
